thread.section_title: Keep&Share Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keep&Share | keepandshare.com
thread.title: KEITH S BARTON
thread.title_full: Keep&Share reviewed by KEITH S BARTON

author: KEITH S BARTON
title: KEITH S BARTON
text: For years I have been using "Keep&Share" as a prompt to me on occasional visits to the website. Sometime over the past year, I was sent an email advising me to the fact that "Keep&Share" has an app. I immediately uploaded the K&S app to my iPhone and iPad. I was surprised that all my historical and current information was given to me after login which has dramatically improved my time management efficiency.
